Minimal Page

This page has only a title tag and bare body content. There are no Open Graph tags, no meta description, no JSON-LD structured data, no author meta tag, and no canonical link.

The metadata extractor should still extract the title from the title element and populate the URL from the source URL. All other metadata fields should be null.

This third paragraph provides enough content length for Readability to confidently identify the article region and extract it successfully.

A fourth paragraph adds additional substance. Readability's heuristics typically require several hundred characters of text content within an identifiable article container.
